website_summaries.verdict: It may be more affordable than most, but this blanket is very well made. Whether you use it for personal comfort or as a therapeutic tool, it will have you covered.
pros: Comes in multiple weights and sizes
Warm and cozy with good insulation
Most owners find these blankets highly effective for treating insomnia and anxiety, and they may be helpful for a number of other conditions such as ADD, ADHD, and autism
cons: Stitched segments are larger than that of some other blankets, which may lead to increased shifting and gathering of the plastic pellets

customer_reviews.title: It is working beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son who is a brain injury survivor. He has struggled with sleep issues for years and years, a fairly common issue after TBI. He is on 4 different medications to try to help him sleep (negligible success), and he has a CPAP for central sleep apnea. He frequently twitches himself awake, so after a lot of reading and research, I invested in this blanket for him. He absolutely LOVES IT! He appears to be getting really good, solid rest as the twitching is minimized under the weight of this blanket. He has always tried to cocoon himself in his sheets and blankets, so I wish I'd invested in one a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity McC

customer_reviews.title: So Calming!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is very soothing! It's very relaxing at the end of the day. I feel like my energy is becoming calmed and contained when I am stressed out. When I am extra stressed I fold the blanket lengthwise, doubling the weight and lay it over me for the first 15 minutes and my muscles begin to release, almost like a massage.
customer_reviews.author: lamplight

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like to sleep with the weight of multiple blankets so I thought I would try this blanket. I absolutely love it. I originally bought the 20 lb and found it to be too heavy for me, so I exchanged it for the 15 lb. I sleep so much better with it that I brought it on vacation with me. It was worth carrying the extra 15 lbs around.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: So Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This is heavenly. My son has ASD. I got it for him, and it helps more than any medication we have ever tried for sleep. I've also borrowed it a couple of times to relieve pain from inflammatory arthritis. It works great. I have a weighted pad that I use on my neck when I sleep. This is like a whole body version of that. Price is great at just over seven bucks a pound. The quality is excellent. And it's easy to care for. No downside. Love. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket because I have trouble falling asleep. I couldn’t be any happier with the blanket not only does it put me to sleep quicker but it also helps me to stay asleep. Also at night I usually bring it to the living room and lay down with it and this helps me relax before I hit the hay for the night. To be honest I don’t have anything to complain about except for not having two separate ones so I don’t have to bring the 20 pound blanket back and forth 😬. That might have to be a future purchase. Included a pic of my blanket on top of my queen sized bed
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Shea

customer_reviews.title: leaking!
customer_reviews.text: i love this blanket and it has truly helped me sleep better. but... the leaking pellets/sand is ridiculous. i used the blanket for a week--put it inside a duvet cover--when i took it out today there was about half pound of loose sand in the duvet. returning today. i will opt for a better product next time.
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - after 6 months it leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review - after 6 months it leaks!!! Terrible! Company won’t return emails. Please do not waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Heavilin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Adverised as comfortable and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Adverised as comfortable and cozy. Only feels like a quilt of cornhole bags. Not worth the cost at all. Returning immediately
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bartow

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really, really wanted for this blanket to work out ... but with one night under it, I knew it was too hot and too heavy. So I have returned it. The return shipping cost ( over $15.00) really bothers me since they say you can try it out and return it. Yes, you can return it ...for about $17.00. I'm aged 60 and about 185 pounds, and the 20 pound blanket was too heavy and too hot even with the AC turned to 69 degrees. Same old nightmares, rushing thoughts and restless sleep even under the blanket. So my 2 excedrin PM and 2 benadryl at bedtime will have to suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Walker

customer_reviews.title: Looked fine in the beginning until I woke up the very ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked fine in the beginning until I woke up the very first morning swimming in a bed of small transparent particles. Apparently the blanket has a leak!
customer_reviews.author: Maher F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality for the amount of money spent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this blanket to help me sleep better with my insomnia and anxiety. I received it today, immediately took it out of the bag, and the micro-pellets spilled all over my floor. I had to return it immediately without even getting to try it. For the amount of money I spent, I got an extremely defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed because I searched for the perfect blanket and spent ...
customer_reviews.text: All the beads in the squares have gone to the outsides of the blanket. There isn’t any weight except around the borders of the blanket. I am disappointed because I searched for the perfect blanket and spent quite a bit of money on this. I have tried to contact someone about this and have had no such luck.
customer_reviews.author: Aleann80

customer_reviews.title: Decent so far, but flecked with stains/bleach? *Good customer service response
customer_reviews.text: Weight distribution seems pretty nice and while you can feel individual beads with your fingers you don't feel them when the blanket is just laying on you. Stitching looks even and tight (thus far) and I don't anticipate them coming loose with regular use. However, brand new out of the package it looks as if the blanket has bleach stains all over it. I'm not sure how that will affect the fabric since care instructions explicitly state not to use bleach. I'm concerned about the warranty too. Contacting the seller to see how to proceed. **EDIT - seller promptly sent a replacement after sending them the pictures. Everything is holding together nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: After having this product less than 2 months it has ...
customer_reviews.text: After having this product less than 2 months it has a hole in it and the plastic weighted beans/balls are spilling into my bed. Very frustrating given the cost of the product.
customer_reviews.author: vtech2011

customer_reviews.title: Feels too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Feels much heavier than 15 lbs. Weighed it, expecting it to be a lot heavier, but it was only over a few pounds. It reeks of a chemical coating, but I was afraid to wash it. I found that I slept more deeply with this blanket, but after a few nights, my joints (hips, knees) began to ache. I'm a side sleeper, and I think the weight compressing my hip and knee joints together like that put a strain on them. I gave this blanket to my daughter, who is physically bigger and stronger than me.
customer_reviews.author: Diane J. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality it’s
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this blanket. The tiny beads that make it “weighted” have slowly come out. They end up all over the bed and floor. It’s a mess and I’m assuming eventually will no longer have it’s weight. Throwing it out. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It wears out as you use it. The small ...
customer_reviews.text: It wears out as you use it. The small pellets in the blanket get flattened out over time and the blanket loses its weight.
customer_reviews.author: rita

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely works!
customer_reviews.text: The blankets works great for helping me fall asleep, relax, stay asleep comfortably. It takes a day or two to adjust to the added weight, but doesn't make it any hotter while sleeping. Easy to manage, on my king bed, it is only on my half of the bed & does not bother my hubby, so it works great for us! Highly recommend for anyone with insomnia, chronic pain, migraines, fibromyalgia. It really has helped me!
customer_reviews.author: Ronya Denean

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this weighted blanket and opened it right away and realized that I had to send it back, and I was highly disappointed. The blanket was poorly made and when I went to try it out I noticed that the clear beads started spilling out. One or two beads I wouldn’t have thought anything about, but I had to get out my vacuum and clean it all up. I also noticed that the beads are not evenly distributed throughout the blanket... poor quality and not worth the price...
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the 20lbs., 60x80, light grey blanket for about five days now and I have absolutely no regrets. Extremely happy with this product. It is very heavy (as intended), so be sure to order the right weight and know that it's a little difficult to carry around depending on what end of the weight recommendation spectrum you are on. I suffer from some extreme anxiety and it's generally worse at night, the deep weight of this blanket has helped immensely so far. It adds an extra layer of comfort that really helps me relax. I have a full/queen size bed and the blanket is just shy of fully fitting. Overall, extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gracey

customer_reviews.title: Great weight, but really hot
customer_reviews.text: The weight of the blanket is great, and the fabric feels nice. However, I found this to be so suffocatingly hot that it doesn't help my sleep issues to be boiling in my skin at night. I do get a little warm at night anyway, but so many others said how lightweight it was that I decided to try it. Be warned: if you are a warm sleeper, this will likely not help your situation. I laid under it for 2 hours one night before having to throw it off and go back to my regular blanket. I plan on returning it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sullrich

customer_reviews.title: **Don't buy this blanket!!!!**
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months ago to help with RLS. I've only used it a handful of times. The beads have all settled into the edges of the blanket. If the blanket slips slightly off the edge of the bed, the weight pulls you over. It's REALLY hard to move the blanket in the middle of the night when all the weight is concentrated around the edges. Horrible blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Domestic Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy. One of the pockets on my blanket came undone after using maybe 10 times. The tiny sand-like pellets are now everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Took the $180 blanket out of the box and it almost immediately started leaking small pellets. Returned the next day
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wonderlic

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic blanket, however the blanket seems to be leaking
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic blanket, however the blanket seems to be leaking, and there are a bunch of little beads all over the bed. It's kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Instant relaxation
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me as a Christmas gift and I absolutely love it. As someone who has suffered with anxiety for many years, I was skeptical if a blanket would really be able to help but I’m amazed. As soon as I laid down with it, I instantly felt relaxed. Ive been sleeping with it and when I wake up in the middle of the night, I’m able to quickly fall back asleep, which is not the norm. I’ve already been telling my family and friends they need to get one. I think everyone can benefit!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the item is a new one.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like I got a used product. The blanket itself was crumpled and put in a brown box with no instructions or any manufacturer handbook etc. I am pretty sure it was returned by someone. The blanket itself felt too hot inside and I was sweating badly. The weight was okay but did not feel like it was evenly distributed. I am going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: Very thin material.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a few days before the first hole......didn't take long for a second or third to appear. Beads leak everywhere, very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Truly lifechanging
customer_reviews.text: I live with insomnia and anxiety disorder. All my life sleeping more than 4 hours, even with pharmaceuticals, has been elusive. This blanket has changed my life in ways I never expected. Truly I did not believe the hype and ordered only after I read research papers on the science behind these blankets and the science is solid. The first night I used the blanket I slept 7 hours. That has been my average since I began using the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: puppyluv

customer_reviews.title: Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not for me. I bought the 15-lb (where per the guide I should use a 17 or 20-lb one (190-lb male), and it feels very heavy. I have insomnia, and this definitely didn't help. I felt like I had to think through how to lift up the heavy blanket to be able to turn over. Had the wife try it too, and she didn't like it either. It may work well for others, but it's not for me.
customer_reviews.author: B. Aller

customer_reviews.title: Great quality that won't break the bank
customer_reviews.text: Was a little wary of spending this much for a blanket, even though it actually was a lot LESS than other brands! I was pleasantly surprised at the quality! It is nice fabric and is well made. And yes, I can say I've joined the ranks of those who love weighted blankets. I especially enjoy using it for meditation time. Will eventually get one for everyone in the family. :)
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Lode

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and better sleep
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because this was among the cheaper options for a weighted blanket but went for it any way because of the good reviews. Well, here is another one. No reason to pay more. The weighted beads stay put, even within their own pockets. It seems durable and the price is right. Oh, and perhaps most importantly my Fitbit says that I sleep about 15% deeper since I got it. Even if it didn’t work it’s still comfy and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Milad Bakhtiari

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love the weighted blanket. I use it every night for sleep. It sure has helped. I had tried it for days I was restless, and it had helped settle. The only bad part about the blanket is that it is not true to size. The description says it is a queen size blanket. I have a queen size bed and it doesn't even fit the bed half way width wise and length wise, it goes 3/4 of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Better than a sleeping pill!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy a friend recently told me about weighted blankets, and I'm so happy I purchased this one. It's better than a sleeping pill (and no side effects!). The weight of the blanket feels great, and it keeps me from moving around so much in my sleep, which gives me a more restful night's sleep. I highly recommend it for anyone who has difficulty sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: T in LA

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I suffer from an array of issues ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I suffer from an array of issues (anxiety, insomnia, depression, OCD) that can make calm, relaxation, and sleep difficult. This blanket is a great tool during stressful moments and while it has not cured my every sleep issue it has noticeably reduced the amount of time it takes me to fall asleep. It's also aesthetically pretty and the material is easy to keep clean, which is important to me. I was on the fence about this product before buying because I'd never dropped that kind of change on a blanket before, but I would do it all over again now that I know what I was missing!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I like it though
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have the magical experience a lot of reviewers had, but I also don't suffer with any of the conditions it says it helps with. I like it though. I tend to fall asleep and wake up in the exact same position whereas I'm used to rolling around a lot. That's kinda cool, but you want to make sure your head is in a good position or else you might wake up with neck pain. I had two other people at home try it for a few minutes and they felt immediate relief.
customer_reviews.author: Campbellman

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: The tiny glass beads it is filled with do not stay in their cells and tend to migrate to the lowest corner, resulting in an unevrn and ineffective fill. After a few menths of using it, I noticed an accumulation of beads inside the Duvet cover! Not worth the ninety bucks I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Sagade

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Listen- I was skeptical. A ‘cooling’ blanket that weighs 20 lbs? No way. But this thing. Oh my. My husband purchased it for me as a gift, and I have slept so incredibly well ever since. The worst part about this blanket is getting up in the mornings. I would also recommend getting a duvet cover from the same brand. So incredibly soft. I’ll update if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kindra

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size (actual= 58x78)
customer_reviews.text: Let me start that I am in LOVE with this blanket. I am getting the BEST sleep I have had in a very long time. This blanket plus a sleep mask = one very happy mom. Anxiety and insomnia were keeping me awake at night, tossing and turning. Waking up and unable to fall back to sleep. This last month of use, I feel so much better. So much more energy, better mood and much more rested. My complaint is that it’s not a queen. Not even close. The “queen” I received is actually 58x78, not 60x80 and it is definitely not big enough for 2 people. So size up! I would still buy again, just bigger.
customer_reviews.author: PharmerMomma

customer_reviews.title: Improved my quality of sleep
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading about it helping with sleep. I always loved a heavy duvet in the winter but have a hot apartment, this blanket provides the weight and comfort without making it too hot to sleep. The weight is evenly distributed. I have the 15 lbs one based on recommendation for my weight and I probably could have gone a bit heavier, although it is astounding how heavy it feels when putting on the cover! I believe it makes me less restless and has improved my quality of sleep. It looks to be good quality material and the color is as shown, although once it is in the cover that doesn't really matter.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality with some sleep improvement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket for my husband to try. He doesn't have any of the diagnoses listed but struggles to get a good night's sleep. I first tried the 20 lb blanket and it was too heavy (it was way under the 10% body weight that I think was recommended). Next we tried the 12 lb blanket and it's been much more comfortable. The blanket appears to be made with quality materials and feels comfortable. He hasn't had any extreme change in sleeping, but he says he does notice a difference. The blanket is not hot at all, just gives you that extra weight.
customer_reviews.author: Farr House

customer_reviews.title: Works well after a couple month, no idea how to clean it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think 20 lbs would be all that much but it's impressively heavy (it replaces a 2nd comforter on my bed). I really don't know if it contributes all that much to a restful nights sleep are true [sleep is complicated and avoiding caffeine, blue lights, late night TV - and regular walking/exercise are probably even more important] but mileage on these things always varies (for $70 it seems like a good investment and certainly is decent/good quality).
customer_reviews.author: DoodleLet

customer_reviews.title: Takes up a king size bed!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blanket! I sleep in an instant as soon as I get under it. I can say that it definitely takes away my stress, anxiety, aches and pains as well as helps me fall asleep quick! I double it up for more weight at times. My husband liked it but said he gets too hot under it. His loss! Lol! I live it and am so glad I purchased it! My daughter has one and loves it too! No one paid me to write this either. I wanted folks to have an honest take on this from a happy consumer!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great support item for Dementia patients
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly in mint condition. I purchased this for my 91 year old mother who is in early stage dementia. The intent was to provide a physical item that could "ground" her a bit as she gets agitated/anxious relatively easily. I definitely noticed her "ticks" lesson a bit when she's under the blanket which is all I can ask for. Thanks so much for a wonderful product that is truly helping those who most desperately need it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: It is not as warm as other weighted blankets. This is good for those of us who like to sleep cool. It helps me sleep through the night and wake up feeling better rested. I would recommend getting a size smaller than your bed so that it doesn't hang off the side because then it would feel too heavy. I would also recommend that if two people share the bed, each one get his/her own blanket for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Laredo Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with blanket!
customer_reviews.text: The blanket came in in only two days so the shipping was good. I have anxiety but the blanket offers a comforting and supporting feeling when I sleep and lounge around the house. It took some time, but then I noticed that the weight was really helping me. The texture is a nice silky feeling and the weight distribution is very even. I'm very happy with my purchase. If I could complain about anything, it would be that I should have ordered a little heavier blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Kayman

customer_reviews.title: I Can Sleep Now?!
customer_reviews.text: I started hearing about weighted blankets and how they help you sleep better, so I decided to try it for myself. Since I received it, I have slept so much better within the past week, it shocked me! I thought it would be like a weight on my chest literally but it's very comfortable. I'm a side sleeper and it moves decently. Sometimes my feet get tangled up with the blanket but overall I truly enjoy it. I got the 25lbs because I didn't think 15lbs would be sufficient for me and I love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cat F.

customer_reviews.title: Read bottom description!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket so much! It seemed heavy at first but I have the best sleep... I usually have trouble getting to sleep due to restless legs and anxiety from the stress of my day and this has helped a bunch. I needed a King size though and in the description at the top, it says the 60" x 80" was for king sized bed and it is not big enough and they do not have a King size available (which would have been 80" x 87"). I went back and tried to find the size I need and it was correct in the bottom section.
customer_reviews.author: Monica-Gayle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: 60 x 80 is much smaller than our queen sized bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my girlfriend as a gift, when I set it up I was amazed at how much smaller it is than it is shown on amazon. It is much smaller than our queen sized bed, actually it isn't big enough for the both of us to use (and we are average sized.) I'd return it, but she likes it. I wish I would've known it wouldn't fit, I would have gladly paid extra for the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: MUCH smaller than expected and I'm salty about it.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket does NOT fit a king sized bed, as stated. It fits a twin size bed nicely. I dont understand why the description states that it will fit a king, that is absolutely ridiculous and completely false. Other than that, I like this blanket, i just cant share it with my partner.
customer_reviews.author: angry customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: It took me couple nights to get used to the blanket; first couple nights felt awkward, but after a few nights I fell in love with it. Now I don't feel it being heavy, feels very comfortable and normal. Now I take it with me on vacations too (road trips). Because of its weight, I have to have a separate bag for it, but it's totally worth it - I sleep so much better with it! The quality is very good. If you end up getting this blanket and feel uncomfortable or awkward first few nights, don't get disappointed, just give yourself more time to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These blankets feel like you are trapped and cannot move. Very uncomfortable and the washing instructions are ridiculous. You have to hand wash with towels then lay your king size weighted blanket down on the floor on top of several towel while you put more towels on the top and simply wait for it to dry. I do not have an area big enough in my home for this type of cleaning. They should not list that it is easy to take care of and be honest about how dreadful they feel on top of two people. You cannot even move
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G. Oddly

customer_reviews.title: Turned my wife into a log
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this blanket. She went from being a jumping bean in bed while sleeping to a still log. I think it's ridiculous to have that much weight on you, but I have to admit that after years of putting up with her sleep issues and complaints, and seeing the difference in the last month with this blanket, I'm a hundred percent believer. It's the best investment I've made. Be sure to get a duvet cover from Zonli too! If it gets dirty you don't want to put this whole heavy thing in a washer.
customer_reviews.author: IZ

customer_reviews.title: Little beads coming from blanket but works well.
customer_reviews.text: Little beads coming from blanket but works well. Not sure if beads will continue to fall out though which is why I put 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Small plastic beads everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I can't find a hole in this blanket and there are small plastic beads everywhere! I missed the return window or I would have done so. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: janeyd

customer_reviews.title: Seeyabye, Insomnia!
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't had a good night's sleep in about a decade. I was skeptical, to say the least, about all the hipster hooey surrounding weighted blankets, but curiosity and desperation for some quality zzzs won the battle and I ordered one. I chose one heavier than the recommended 10% of body weight because "go big or go home", right? This thing CHANGED MY LIFE. It surrounds my body like quicksand and holds me so tightly that I no longer toss and turn. I just sleep. Deeply and comfortably. Through the night. Seriously, all night.
customer_reviews.author: stangasm

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is amazing. I sleep so much better and wake up feeling rested. I purchased a 15 lb. one, which feels very heavy until you spread it out on the bed. Once I crawl in under it though, it's like it's not even there. I don't toss and turn (if you move a lot, you feel the weight) anymore and no more leg cramps because I am not tossing and turning.
customer_reviews.author: smpcards15

customer_reviews.title: They lie about the size. Edit: and generally suck
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not a horrible blanket so far. But if I'm going to pay money for a product I expect to get what I pay for. It advertised at 60x80 but in reality it is 55x75 so that really annoys me. If I wanted to get turned out like a cheap hooker I'd go live with my uncle. Edit: returned the blanket it is so bad. I am an anxious sleeper and have a lot of problems with my joins as well. I've never slept worse and was in constant pain every day. This blanket made my circulation worse and just generally ruined a couple of weeks of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Numeon

customer_reviews.title: Get one. Enough said.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is amazing! The weight (20lb) is evenly distributed and helps me sleep like a charm. The quality is superb, no loose threads or fraying. While not the softest blanket in the world, I use a soft, flat bed sheet under it and can't tell the difference. It is also shockingly very cool temp wise for it's size and weight. I would highly recommend to anyone that sleeps with multiple blankets for weight, or has sleeping problems.
customer_reviews.author: jordan flores

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blanket. It changed the way I sleep. I sleep soundly, peacefully, and all the way through the night. I do not have anxiety or anything of that sort, I just enjoy extra weight on my while I sleep. I recommend this blanket to anyone and everyone. Size wise, it fits the top of a queen bed but does not go over the sides, which isn’t an issue since the weight of the blanket pins you down and helps you avoid rolling around in bed/shifting your sheets. It’s not too hot either.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Panchevre

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how this works but it does
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about 6 months, soi feel qualified to review this product. It is as we got it, weight perfectly distributed., No loud crunchy beans. I believe it's filled with silent sand. We both like it, and my wife's incessant insomnia has been reduced by half. I'd recommend it to a friend. We got the largest size to put on our oversize king bed. In the 4-6 months since we got this, I have noticed an improvement in my wife's mood. She suffers from incessant insomnia, which has been reduced a quite a bit. The weight doesn't move around and is silent. I believe it may be filled w sand, which is silent. I'd highly recommend this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My over all rating was a 5 star this blanket works really well especially if you have anxiety or sleep problems as far as cleaning goes your better bet is to send it to a dry cleaner due to its weight I think it might be a bit too heavy to do in a regular washing machine but all in all the 1st night I slept with it I ended up sleeping better it does get quite warm up underneath it so you might wanna consider having the fan on but all in all I really like this blanket and would recommend it to others also I would say that it is a very easy giftable item
customer_reviews.author: Labreeska m Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality blanket at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I have an 11 year old with severe anxiety and discovered he settled down when under physical pressure (an episode ended in him crawling under his mattress). He LOVES this blanket. When he starts getting anxious he knows to go lay down with his blanket and he says it really helps him.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 60x80”, 20 lb blanket for my partner, who experiences relatively frequent anxiety and insomnia. She was obsessed with it from the moment she opened the package. It really helps her feel grounded in her body, and she finds it so relaxing. She’s approximately 155 lbs, and really enjoys the full 20 lbs - I would recommend anyone debating which weight to go with choose the heavier one. It remains a nice temperature, and doesn’t get too hot. I would highly recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dacey

customer_reviews.title: Weighted blankets are amazing, but pay extra for bamboo covers instead.
customer_reviews.text: First, I'd like to start by saying that I was skeptical of weighted blankets, but I tried this one first. I had a wonderful and restful night of sleep, but whenI woke up, I woke up in a puddle of sweat and beads on my forehead and body still. I chose this blanket because of the cost as an entry into weighted blankets, but after buying another 100% bamboo weighted blanket, I can't go back to cotton. Further, this cotton feels rough on my skin. I wished I had kept the box because I certainly would've sent this back to the seller. It's too hot to be worth it to keep.
customer_reviews.author: jill DeBourge

customer_reviews.title: Sleep like a BABY
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what it is about these blankets but they make me sleep like a baby. I've tried weighted blankets in the past and they have been too hot for me. This blanket seems to be fine in terms of temperature, I've been using it for eight months now and I can say I love this blanket. It has great weight and just secures you while you sleep. Something about these, they create a good nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Felice Navidad

customer_reviews.title: I thought I wouldn't like it but..
customer_reviews.text: I like cotton over microfiber, which most weighted blankets are made of. I overheat easily and perfer cotton so I got this one. The only downside is that the its seems to attract ny cat's hair and fuzzies. Also moving the blanket while adjusting positions,etc can be alittle strenuous. The blanket is very comfortable, I got the right size but I wish it was slightly heavier, the weight is evenly distributed so I almost don't feel it. I don't know if I get better sleep but it is pretty comfortable. I originally thought I was going to hate a weighted blanket, thought it would feel like having an asthma attack, but I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Cute, quiet and cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 10lb blanket for myself. I had initially purchased an 80x60 20lb blanket, but it was way too big and heavy, and not easily laundered at home. So, I returned it and got this one. I wanted a good quality cotton that I could wash at home and that only covered me, not my whole bed. This one is cute and perfect. It weighs down my legs so they feel settled, but not so much that I can’t turn over. It’s also cool and quiet. Took me a few days to get used to it, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ainaustin

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: 15lbs feels really heavy when you're carrying this blanket around, but when you actually get under it the weight is so distributed that it just feels like any other heavier blanket. I did not experience the miracle sleep a lot of people report from these blankets, I don't feel like I'm being hugged. For the money I spent, it's just an OK blanket. It isn't too hot, so that's nice for people who are worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: my first weighted blanket purchase and I love it! The grey color is great and exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: my first weighted blanket purchase and I love it! The grey color is great and exactly what I was expecting. I got the 60"x80" size which was said to fit a queen bed. It was the right size, although I was expecting it to hang off my queen size bed like a comforter but it is the exact size of my mattress. Not a bad thing, I was just expecting it to be a little bigger! The blanket has already helped me sleep through the night with my first few uses. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: kasia nowalski

customer_reviews.title: Great, economical weighted blanket
customer_reviews.text: We bought this blanket on a pre-Black Friday deal and it has been a game-changer! We sleep so soundly and it has really helped with my back problems from sleeping on my side/stomach. I am so glad we went with the 20lb version because these things are heavy! While a 25lb blanket was recommended for us, I think the 20lb version is perfect to use for sleeping every night. It fits our queen bed perfectly, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone I know loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this weighted blanket! Ffor the price you pay, it is totally worth it! It isn't the most glamorous or cutest or softness blanket in the world but it is cozy and is waited. I accidentally ordered two. So I kept on for myself and the other was intended to be a gift to my boyfriends mom. My boyfriend loved the weighted blanket so much (mine) that he kept the other one and never gave it to his mom for me! (I made him buy another for his mom.) So I would say this blanket is so nice people will steal it for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: great for anxiety
customer_reviews.text: My college-aged daughter has had trouble sleeping and was recently diagnosed with anxiety. Sent her this blanket 3 weeks ago and she is in love with it! I read that "grounding" the body with this type of blanket triggers an increase in serotonin and melatonin and decreases cortisol, the adrenaline hormone. She takes that blanket everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: E. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: This is the best gift I have ever given myself worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: I seldom buy things for myself so this was a huge purchase for me and I was worried. This is the best gift I have ever given myself worth every cent. I have never slept so well this blanket made me feel like I was being held. I weigh 165lbs and bought the 17.5 lb blanket, it's perfect. I have to travel next month and I'm trying to figure out how to take my blanket with me!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Careful with that rotator cuff
customer_reviews.text: My rotator cuff problems recurred after using this blanket for a week. I ldo ove this blanket. However, it can be difficult pulling a 15 lb blanket over you, laying on your side, reaching behind you as you would a regular blanket, it just isn't the same. Think about pulling it before you do it. I changed the way I use this blanket, I just cannot treat it the way I do a regular blanket and I never thought I would have to. You can hurt yourself especially if you have rotator cuff problems. If you don't have rotator cuff problems, you will if you aren't really careful.
customer_reviews.author: Muggsy60

customer_reviews.title: Anxiety relief / too small
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because I am a horrible sleeper.. This blanket helps me feel secure and kind of like I am getting hugged all night long. I wish the foot end were heavier because I have found if I double over the blanket and put it from my knees down it calms my restless legs and achy feet after a day of nursing 12 hours. Overall the blanket is for a queen size bed but it only fits to the very edges of the mattress, there is no overlay on the sides. it is not a great fit for a queen mattress.
customer_reviews.author: donna rae fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Now I want my own!
customer_reviews.text: I researched a ton of weighted blankets and decided on this one. Well made and the cover washes nicely. I purchased this for my 91 year old mother with dementia and it calms her down quickly and she falls asleep much faster now. I bought her the 12 pound weight. Mom weighs about 120 pounds and because of her advanced years I didn’t want anything too heavy for her. We’ve had no rips or leaking from this blanket. I will definitely purchase this brand again for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Snidera62

customer_reviews.title: First time Weighted Blanket User
customer_reviews.text: Got the 20lb queen, just be aware that the blanket only covers the top of the mattress, not the sides. This is fine as it's easier to get in an out of bed. It's a nice feeling to have a weighted blanket, but didn't have a huge change in my sleep. The distribution of the pellets is very good. It is also not hot which I was concerned about. Generally a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best night’s sleep ever
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting a weighted blanket for a long time and it’s been amazing. I wanted one that did not come with a plush cover - I prefer cool sheets to cuddly, fuzzy blankets. This one is perfect - i got it this summer and used it alone, and now that it’s cold I’ve put it into my old duvet cover. It is the perfect weight and I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron L. Meerdink

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the little loops!
customer_reviews.text: The 5 pound blanket is working for our daughter however today she got her finger stuck inside of one of these little loops that are sewn all around. I don’t understand why they are on the blanket and might be an issue for any small kiddos who like to put fingers inside of things and twist. Her poor finger was purple and really hurting by the time she woke up from her nap. I’m going to run a stitch through the loops to sew them shut.
customer_reviews.author: TRAVIS ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Autism parents- worth a try- promise
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 20 yr old autistic daughter at the suggestion of a behaviorist. He was suprized no one had suggested to us before. I read reviews, researched wts and decided on the 15 lb blanket. 10 % of her body wt. Took out if box and thought it was to heavy. But she loves it. Given the option of any other blanket she picks this one. She does not toss and turn as much at night. Wish I had know about it years ago
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beads leak everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this blanket and i got a good night sleep. Its the beads that leaked out all over my bed the first night i used it that i am concerned about. I really wish it was better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle A.

customer_reviews.title: Love the weight, but beads do escape
customer_reviews.text: I read a review for this product before I bought it expressing the need for a duvet cover because beads leak out. It's totally true. Lots of little, too small to pick up, beads will escape. I recommend taking the Duvet cover off outdoors. Other than that I really love this. Just wish I would have bought the larger size. The Twin is a tad too small for a 5'4" lady. I like to be completely surrounded by my blanket.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessJamieK01

customer_reviews.title: Not really cooling
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight of this blanket, however my husband and I do not find that it’s cooling at all. We get super hot and I wake up sweating. We keep our home very cool at night and still we’re hot with this blanket. I do have the recommended duvet cover on this blanket, so maybe that makes it hotter? But without the cover it’s not protected so I don’t see the point. Another complaint is that it’s not very soft. The fabric is stiff.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong color and reeks of chemical fumes.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love it....but as soon as I took it out of the box (and realized they had sent me a color I DID NOT order), the chemical fume odor coming off of it almost made me pass out. I thought I’d let it air out on the porch for a little while. After I hung it up, I realized my hands were coated with whatever chemical was giving off the smell. And it doesn’t just wash off. It’s like gasoline’s drunk cousin. Hard pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Steigerwalt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is amazing. I surprised my husband with it and he absolutely loves it! We've read about the benefits of weighted blankets for years, but never took the plunge due to the cost. Glad I finally decided to purchase one! My husband says it's worth every single penny. It helps him fall asleep quicker and keeps him asleep - the extra weight is very relaxing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: peacefulveganmom

customer_reviews.title: Great lightening deal!  Exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, nice material, husband loves it! Makes a great gift for someone who needs one to help with sleep issues, sensory issues or if they just love the feel of the "x-ray weighted vest" at the dentist office. Conforms nicely around you. It is very warming though and since it is winter in the north that's OK. Husband is wondering if in the summer it will make him too hot sleeping under it. It does make it difficult for me to pull covers back to my side when he "steals" them as the weighted blanket adds 20lbs. of weigh I have to try to pull the regular blanket out from under.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It’s So, So
customer_reviews.text: I’ve use this blanket now for a few nights and find it very helpful to feel “snuggled up“. I cannot say it’s help me sell asleep faster or help with anxiety. I weigh less than 140 pounds so I got the 12 pound blanket and find it heavy to carry and awkward to use anywhere but on my bed because it just slips off. The duvet cover I bought for it is very nice though and stays in place due to the ties they added on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Wright

customer_reviews.title: A good product for people with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: My wife generally has anxiety and a hard time falling and staying asleep. She’s had this blanket for a couple of weeks and she gets a more comfortable and restful sleep. I even tried it once and it’s very calming to have on. This is our first weighted blanket and i’m happy with the quality and overall design. 15lbs is a comfortable weight for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: David Wolf

customer_reviews.title: NOT the correct size
customer_reviews.text: Says 60"x80" for the one I purchased... I measured it in at 56"x74". Too small for the cover that's supposed to be fitted for it. Returning. I do understand a weighted blanket will sit on "top" of the bed vs. a weighted comforter hangs over the bed but... this is hugely off from what it's supposed to be!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Glass beads are escaping!
customer_reviews.text: It took me about a week to get used to it, but after I did, I loved it. But now I am a little disappointed. I just changed the sheets and there are little pockets of glass beads all over my top sheet. I don't see where they are coming from, since they are in many different areas. Not sure if I can repair it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M

customer_reviews.title: Quality blanket and cover but watch sizing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality blanket. I went by the size chart and ordered the twin size for a full bed because my son has a modern bed low to floor. We did not want overhang. The twin did not cover the full at all not even to the ends of the mattress even though the chart says it will. Ordered the cover with it, also excellent quality. The blanket has little loops on it and the cover has ties inside for every loop on the blanket keeping it in place. I returned the twin and am re-ordering the full.
customer_reviews.author: nylady

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a weighted blanket for the longest time. I couldn't be happier than I am with this one! The quality is nice - very well-made and definitely more than I expected given the low price. Because this blanket is not machine washable, I used an old queen/full sized duvet cover to it. Fits perfectly. I'll definitely be buying a few more of these for Christmas gifts this year. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: TiffSebring

customer_reviews.title: Weight distribution is off totally
customer_reviews.text: It was a great concept. It wasn't too hot or heavy, but the beads shifted so much that only the edges were weighted. It was ok if I folded it in half, but I got the biggest size so I wouldn't need to do that. If only the weight distribution was on point! Cozy blanket and I almost kept it, but I couldn't get behind keeping a $160 blanket if it wasn't doing what I bought it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I honestly got worse sleep with this thing. Caused me to toss and turn WAY more than I did before using it. The build quality is good and the weight is distributed well across the entire blanket, though.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: very soft!
customer_reviews.text: 140 lb - 12 pound twin blanket for 1 person - just about perfect weight - would not go any higher. the blanket is nice enough that a protective cover would not be needed, except for the blanket getting dirty - did use the protective cover i bought along with the blanket - no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: dale lattea

customer_reviews.title: Don't care if it's a fad, I'm sleeping great.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't beat the price on this blanket, had wanted to try one for some time and decided on this one. I will say that while I bought the "queen" sized blanket, it only covers the length and width of the mattress, there is no overlap. I position this blanket between the top-sheet and comforter, and it does the trick. The amount of pressure was something to get used to, but I found myself falling asleep more quickly and waking up less often when I use it. I haven't experienced any leaking materials, and the blanket on its own is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Good in theory
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this weighted blanket based on the reviews and it helped with my restless leg syndrome. Unfortunately, the quality is seriously lacking as the beads started to leak out after a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: TitleTown01

customer_reviews.title: Soothing weighted blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. It did not have any rips or tears upon delivery. It didn't get a hole in it until my dog accidentally did it while trying to get her bone. The blanket is sewn with like little compartments though so I can just patch it and only a little bit of the glass beads are missing. I wouldn't trust putting it in a washer or anything but I imagine spot cleaning or perhaps hanging it in the shower would be okay. I am 56 ish and about a hundred and thirty-five lb and I thought the 15 lb weight was perfect for me. I love the snuggly feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it :)
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I'm not one who would benefit from a weighted blanket, but my husband absolutely loves it. He has used it for a couple nights now and says he's never slept so well. I have noticed that he hasn't been snoring :) The size of the blanket is pretty much the exact size across the top of our queen-sized mattress, but since I didn't prefer it and it's not too bulky, I just pushed it over to his side. I was pleased with the quality of the blanket for the price. It was a very reasonable price point compared to other similar weighted blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Nmpollard
